detected_errors.description: More than 50% of the 2D-plan rooms/spaces are missing or not separately modeled (e.g., playroom, foyer/closets, WC, pantry) and the layout is substantially different.
Room configuration/adjacencies do not match the 2D plan; the 3D model appears to represent a different floor plan overall.
A bedroom/bed is modeled in 3D, but the provided 2D plan does not indicate a bedroom in this level, suggesting incorrect room identity.

summary: Although the second image is a real 3D cutaway, it is rejected because it does not faithfully represent the 2D plan and omits/changes a majority of the rooms.
